name: object-utils
description: Library of useful utilities for objects manipulations.

scripts.test: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --exit --r ts-node/register -r chai/register-expect -r ./@setup/setup.ts
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run ts
scripts.check:full: npm run check && npm run coverage && npm run audit

author: Aneta Suns <suns.echoes@gmail.com>
